statements: SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE genre='Action';
SELECT id, title FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, genre FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, genre FROM movies WHERE genre='Comedy' AND release_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT id, title FROM movies WHERE title LIKE 'The%' ORDER BY title;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND release_date > '2019-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC, title ASC;
SELECT id, title, genre FROM movies WHERE genre IN ('Drama', 'Romance') ORDER BY genre, release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, genre FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE nationality = 'American' ORDER BY birthday ASC;
SELECT name, nationality FROM actors WHERE birthday > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT movie_id, title FROM movies JOIN actors ON movies.movie_id = actors.actor_id WHERE actors.nationality = 'USA';
SELECT DISTINCT title FROM movies WHERE genre IN ('Comedy', 'Drama') ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' AND genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT title, nationality FROM movies INNER JOIN actors ON movies.movie_id = actors.actor_id WHERE actors.birthday < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT actor_name, nationality FROM actors ORDER BY actor_name;
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT m.title, a.actor_name FROM movies m INNER JOIN movie_actors ma ON m.movie_id = ma.movie_id INNER JOIN actors a ON ma.actor_id = a.actor_id WHERE ma.role = 'Lead Actor' ORDER BY m.title;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, nationality FROM actors ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT movies.title, actors.actor_name, movie_actors.role FROM movies JOIN movie_actors ON movies.movie_id = movie_actors.movie_id JOIN actors ON movie_actors.actor_id = actors.actor_id;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT name, nationality, birth_year FROM directors WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT movie_id, director_id FROM movie_directors ORDER BY movie_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC, title ASC
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE genre='Action' OR genre='Adventure'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name
SELECT m.title, d.name FROM movies m JOIN movie_directors md ON m.movie_id = md.movie_id JOIN directors d ON md.director_id = d.director_id
SELECT * FROM directors WHERE nationality='American' ORDER BY birth_year ASC
SELECT * FROM movie_titles;
SELECT id, title, release_date FROM movie_titles ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM movie_titles WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT director_name, title FROM movie_directors JOIN movie_titles ON movie_directors.movie_id = movie_titles.id;
SELECT actor_name, rating FROM movie_actors JOIN movie_reviews ON movie_actors.movie_id = movie_reviews.movie_id WHERE rating > 8.0;
SELECT * FROM movie_titles;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movie_titles ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT mt.title, mr.rating FROM movie_titles mt JOIN movie_reviews mr ON mt.id = mr.movie_id WHERE mr.rating > 8;
SELECT ma.actor_name, mt.title, md.director_name FROM movie_actors ma JOIN movie_titles mt ON ma.movie_id = mt.id JOIN movie_directors md ON mt.id = md.movie_id;
SELECT mg.genre_name, COUNT(mt.id) AS num_movies FROM movie_titles mt JOIN movie_genre mg ON mt.genre = mg.genre_name GROUP BY mg.genre_name HAVING COUNT(mt.id) > 3;
